title: EventBridge event enrichment with AWS Lambda
description: Enrich events with Lambda and put them back onto the event bus for downstream consumers

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern will produce events with enrichment flag. Enricher (Lambda function) picks up the event, enriches then puts the event back onto the bus. Downstream consumers get the enriched event

authors.name: David Boyne
authors.bio: Senior Developer Advocate at AWS focusing on EDA and Serverless.
